column2: The title of the website as it will appear in the 'title' tag in the html head
URL of the CDN (Content delivery network) to be used for the common JS and CSS
The full path of the sydney root
The directory where the webinstance is hosted (should not be used)
The default module to display when connecting to the website
The default language
The default locale (for formating dates, numbers and currency)
The default layout file to be used for the public side
The environment type (PROD, DEV, TEST)
Adapter to use for the DB server (this should not change)
Host to be used for the DB server
User name to connect the DB server
Password to connect the DB server
Name of the main DB to use
Time the forms should be cached (in publicforms2)
Directory where the webinstance files lie (generated by the meta-admin)
ID of the webinstance in the DB (generated by the meta-admin)
Directory where to put the app logs
Directory where to put the cached data
Directory where to find the custom module within the webinstance
The path where to save the captcha images
Directory where to store the application data for the webinstance
Google account email to use for the stats
Google account password
ID of the account for the analytics connection
Key for the connection to the Cloud file API at Rackspace
Username for the connection to the Cloud file API at Rackspace
Corus specific: dir path to sony files
Corus specific: dir path to warner files
Corus specific: dir path to universal files
Should we use the short SEO friendly URL or not
Should the admin have the default Sydney layout or the website's
The container to be used for the cloud file API at Rackspace
Should we show the legal agreement in with the 'register' form?
Should we activate the access right module (it should be configured first)
Default email for the general inqueries for the webinstance
List of the optional additional layouts separated by a comma
Should the blank pages be skipped automatically? (and go to the next child node)
Should we display the 'lost password' feature
The type of registration (types to be documented ??? )
Date when we activated the Google Analytics service
Total space allowed for files in the Files module
Should we activate the workflow (module should be active too)
